channel.title: How do u change the xp rate and the lvls...?
channel.description:
how do u change the xp rate and the lvls...please some 1 the max lvl u can get is 135 and max xp 480000000 something i cant remmber can some 1 tel me how to edit it or tel me hwo to slow the xp down whn hitting a dummy/door or hay stack please some 1 got lvl 253 in ma server in 50mins....
im using ultimatepk or pimpscape i dont know what thy are appart form iuse thm as clients if tht help u
